about_the_game:
DATA_BREAK is a darkly humorous horror RPG. You play as an office drone who lives a seemingly ordinary life, but something isn't right... A mysterious stranger will soon set into motion a series of events that gradually reveal the horrifying truth...

Inspired by games like Earthbound, Undertale (notably passive combat options and humour) and LISA: The Painful.

Features


  • Experience a mundane existence in game, as well as in real life!
  • Get showered, go to work, eat, sleep!
  • A PLAYABLE TOILET!
  • Beat or befriend foes like spiders, the elderly, teens, someone that definitely isn't Mickey Mouse, your boss, and more.
  • Lots of choices, and some that will bite you in the *** later!
  • Care for your cat. Or not because you are heartless POS.
  • An awesome original and authentic 8-bit soundtrack
  • Lots of jokes, references and Easter eggs
  • Multiple endings
  • Learn the meaning of life*
*you might not learn the meaning of life.

name: DATA_BREAK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 8/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews:
“Shaping up to be a great game with a fun blend of charm and fourth wall breaking creepiness.”


“Any game that requires you to get points by kissing your cat is an automatic 11/10 for me. Game of the Year!”
11/10 –
short_description: A darkly humorous horror RPG about an office drone who discovers that there are even scarier things than a life of the 9-5 routine.
